pull.title: Scripts and tools: fixed Docker dependencies
pull.body:
The Docker does not depend on `apt-cacher-ng` package.
Also see: https://github.com/bitcoin-core/docs/pull/33

fixed Docker dependencies

The Docker does not depend on `apt-cacher-ng` package.

events.body: @hebasto Can you combine this PR  and #13999 into #13998. Given that all three are small changes to the same file, 3 separate PRs isn't necessary, and having all the changes in a single PR makes for easier testing. You can keep the 3 individual commits.

<!--e57a25ab6845829454e8d69fc972939a-->Note to reviewers: This pull request conflicts with the following ones:

* #13998 (Scripts and tools: fix error message if Docker installed already by hebasto)

If you consider this pull request important, please also help to review the conflicting pull requests. Ideally, start with the one that should be merged first.
